<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update Status"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"patch"}
  path={"/invites/{inviteId}/status"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Update the status of an invite by ID. Only allowed for the invitee.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"inviteId","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"The response to the invitation.","required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"status":{"type":"string","enum":["accepted","declined"]}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"204":{"description":"Request executed successfully"},"403":{"description":"Authenticated user does not have access","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error_message":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error_message"]}}}},"404":{"description":"Resource not found","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error_message":{"type":"string","default":"Document not found"}},"required":["error_message"]}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
